original: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hzero. induction Hreduce. - apply reducetop with (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb). + auto. + apply divP with (n:=n) (a:=a) (b:=b) (H:=nonzeroP_mults A0 eqA a b q0). + apply mults_comp_minuspf; auto.
